title: Update checklist with labeled checkboxes for Bias, OBS, LQS, and FVG

requirements.summary: Update AddTradeDialog component to display exactly four checkbox items with descriptive labels: 'Bias - Market direction', 'OBS - Order blocks', 'LQS - Liquidity sweeps', and 'FVG - Fair value gaps'
acceptanceCriteria: AddTradeDialog displays exactly four checklist items
Each item shows as a checkbox with a label combining the term and its description (e.g., 'Bias - Market direction')
Checklist items are in this order: Bias, OBS, LQS, FVG

file_operations.description: Update the pre-trade checklist section to display exactly four checkbox items with labels. Replace the current checklist rendering to show 'Bias - Market direction', 'OBS - Order blocks', 'LQS - Liquidity sweeps', and 'FVG - Fair value gaps' in that order. Each checkbox should display the term followed by a dash and its description. Ensure the checklist state management correctly handles these four items and their checked states are properly saved when the form is submitted.

requirements.summary: Update EditTradeDialog component to display exactly four checkbox items with descriptive labels matching AddTradeDialog: 'Bias - Market direction', 'OBS - Order blocks', 'LQS - Liquidity sweeps', and 'FVG - Fair value gaps'
acceptanceCriteria: EditTradeDialog displays exactly four checklist items matching AddTradeDialog
Each item shows as a checkbox with a label combining the term and its description
Existing trade checklist data is preserved and displayed correctly

file_operations.description: Update the pre-trade checklist section to display exactly four checkbox items with labels matching AddTradeDialog. Replace the current checklist rendering to show 'Bias - Market direction', 'OBS - Order blocks', 'LQS - Liquidity sweeps', and 'FVG - Fair value gaps' in that order. Each checkbox should display the term followed by a dash and its description. Ensure the checklist loads the existing trade's checklist data correctly and preserves the checked states when updating the trade.

requirements.summary: Update TradesList component to display the four checklist items (Bias, OBS, LQS, FVG) with their descriptive labels when showing trade details
acceptanceCriteria: Trade detail view shows checklist items with full labels (e.g., 'Bias - Market direction')
Checked and unchecked states are clearly visible
Display matches the order and labels used in the add/edit dialogs

file_operations.description: Update the trade detail view dialog to display checklist items with their full descriptive labels: 'Bias - Market direction', 'OBS - Order blocks', 'LQS - Liquidity sweeps', and 'FVG - Fair value gaps'. Ensure the display shows checked and unchecked states clearly (e.g., using checkmark icons or visual indicators) and maintains the same order as the add/edit dialogs. The labels should match exactly across all components.
